name: Call Me President
description:
Call Me President is an amazing Merge Puzzle Game to bring you happiness every day! And the whole game is completely free! Download for fun!
- More than 100 different kinds of presidents can be collected: including George Washington, Abraham Lincoln, Richard Nixon, Bill Clinton, etc.！
- The president is besieged by hateful enemies. Come and save him
- Free acceleration: Free acceleration every day gives you double income
- Stuck? We provide rich flying gifts and golden egg rewards every day to let you play smoothly
- Don't wait! Come to Call Me President
